name: Streaming BiqQuery data through DLP to reidentify data flex template
description: Java flex template for streaming BiqQuery data through regional DLP to reidentify the data.

parameters.name: inputBigQueryTable
parameters.label: BigQuery input table name.
parameters.helpText: Input BigQuery table for results specified as: PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE or DATASET.TABLE.

parameters.name: outputBigQueryDataset
parameters.label: BigQuery output dataset name.
parameters.helpText: Output BigQuery table with reidentified data as: DATASET

parameters.name: deidentifyTemplateName
parameters.label: DLP structured de-identification template name.
parameters.helpText: Name of the DLP structured de-identification template that was used to deidentify data in the BiqQuery source. Format is 'projects/<PROJECT>/locations/<LOCATION>/deidentifyTemplates/<TEMPLATE_ID>'

parameters.name: dlpLocation
parameters.label: DLP location.
parameters.helpText: The location of the DLP template resource.

parameters.name: dlpProjectId
parameters.label: DLP project.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project that holds the DLP template.

parameters.name: confidentialDataProjectId
parameters.label: Project for output BigQuery that has confidential data.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project that holds the confidential data in BigQuery.

parameters.name: dlpTransform
parameters.label: DLP transformation type.
parameters.helpText: Choose between DLP DE-IDENTIFY or RE-IDENTIFY.

parameters.name: batchSize
parameters.label: DLP batch size.
parameters.helpText: Number of records to be sent in a batch in the call to the DLP API. Default is 100
